snippet: Arab states are said to be conducting talks about which country might replace Saudi Arabia in a nonpermanent Security Council role.
abstract: Jordan is considering seeking the nonpermanent United Nations Security Council seat that Saudi Arabia rejected in a pique of anger at the United States.
lead_paragraph: Arab states are said to be conducting talks about which country might replace Saudi Arabia in a nonpermanent Security Council role.

headline.main: Rejected Seat on U.N. Panel Is Considered by Jordan
headline.print_headline: Rejected Seat On U.N. Panel Is Considered By Jordan
